name: Switch Them Around
description:
This is a simple puzzle game where you have to switch blocks around to move them.

Click with the mouse over switchable blocks to move them in pairs.

Made for the Mini Jam 10 -Micro-

All puzzles take place on a single grid space, with only one action available to do at a time. It is a micro-puzzler!

Made by Topper - @Topper_Games

Have fun!
